title: Smart Energy Management for Buildings
description: Develop an AI-powered system that optimizes energy consumption in commercial buildings by analyzing usage patterns, weather data, and occupancy levels. The solution should provide real-time recommendations and automated controls to reduce energy waste while maintaining occupant comfort.

required_skills._comment: Skills needed for this problem, rated 1-10 for minimum proficiency level

required_roles._comment: Roles needed: developer, designer, product_manager, data_scientist, researcher, marketer, business_analyst

_hours_comment: Total estimated hours of work needed (typically 100-150 for hackathon projects)
_ambiguity_comment: How defined the problem is, scale 1-10 (1=very specific requirements, 10=very open-ended)
_team_size_comment: Ideal team size for this problem (typically 4-6 people)
success_criteria: Data analysis showing potential energy savings
additional_context: Partner organization: GreenTech Solutions. Access to sample building data will be provided. Focus on commercial office buildings with 50-200 employees.

title: AI-Powered Accessibility Assistant
description: Create a mobile app that uses computer vision and AI to help visually impaired individuals navigate indoor spaces. The app should provide audio descriptions of surroundings, identify obstacles, read text aloud, and guide users to specific locations within buildings.
success_criteria: Functional mobile app with core navigation features
additional_context: Partnership with National Federation of the Blind. Access to testing facilities and user feedback sessions. Focus on smartphone-based solution using existing hardware.

title: Financial Health Dashboard for Small Businesses
description: Build a comprehensive financial analytics platform that helps small business owners understand their financial health, predict cash flow issues, and receive personalized recommendations for improving profitability. Include integration with common accounting software and banking APIs.
success_criteria: Integration with at least one accounting platform
additional_context: Partnership with Small Business Development Center. Access to anonymized financial data from 50+ small businesses. Focus on businesses with $100K-$2M annual revenue.
